Length.description: How far the handle extends downwards.

MaxSpeed.description: The maximum amount of speed you can get from this object.

Speed.description: The speed at which you launch away from this object.

OutOfControl.description: How long the game locks your control for after coming in contact with this object.

IsOneTimeUp.description: Whether the UpReel only works once, or will allow you to grab it infinitely.

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.

Targets.description: The objects affected by this event.

Type.description: What type of signal to send to each affected object.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Timer.description: How long to wait after this event is triggered before sending a signal to all affected objects.

Extra.value: Pulleys you grab onto to go straight up.
